data.title: Tandi Wright Profile & Bio
data.meta_description: Tandi Wright is an Actor represented by Johnson & Laird. View their career highlights and acting biography. To enquire about Tandi contact our team at +64 9 376 0882 or email info@johnsonlaird.co.nz
data.text: Tandi Wright, a renowned New Zealand actress with a diverse 25-year career, has consistently secured prominent roles in TV, film, and theatre, both domestically and internationally. Her latest lead US film role is “Pearl”, Directed by Ti West and alongside Mia Goth and her “Creamerie” TV series is being shown on Hulu in the US. Her versatile portfolio encompasses a wide array of productions, spanning from long-running Kiwi shows like “Shortland Street”, “Nothing Trivial,” “8000 Words” to international cinematic blockbusters such as “Raising Waylon,” “Jack the Giant Slayer,” and “Love and Monsters.” Noteworthy credits include “The Returned,” for US Fremantle and her lead role in Amazon series, “The Wilds.”
